user_request: install app "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit"
screen_desc: The screenshot displays an Android app drawer with a grid of installed applications. At the top, there is a Google search bar with Assistant access. The visible apps include system apps like Camera, Calendar, and Chrome, along with third-party apps such as Adobe Acrobat, eBay, and DuckDuckGo. Some app icons are placeholders, likely indicating unfinished or test apps. The navigation bar at the bottom includes buttons for home, back, and recent apps.

The Play Store icon is visible on the top-right corner of the screen, so the next step is to tap on it to open the Play Store.
Future Action Plan: Search for 'Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit'.
Install the app from the search results.
